onbon.y2.play

Class MarqueeAreaPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.play.MarqueeAreaPage

  • public class MarqueeAreaPage
extends java.lang.Object
    The page displays a single line text inside the marquee area.
    Author:
    ONBON
